description:
PHP is an HTML-embedded scripting language commonly used with the Apache HTTP Server.
Security Fix(es):
* php: Local privilege escalation via PHP-FPM (CVE-2021-21703)
* php: SSRF bypass in FILTER_VALIDATE_URL (CVE-2021-21705)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the AlmaLinux Release Notes linked from the References section.
solution:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
summary: An update for php-pgsql is now available for AlmaLinux 8.
title: Moderate: php:7.4 security update
